scripts.package:win: npm run electron-build && cross-var electron-packager dist $npm_package_name --icon=./src/favicon.ico --out=packages --platform=win32 --arch=all --overwrite
scripts.package:linux: npm run electron-build && cross-var electron-packager dist $npm_package_name --icon=./src/favicon.ico --out=packages --platform=linux --arch=all --overwrite
scripts.package:osx: npm run electron-build && cross-var electron-packager dist $npm_package_name --icon=./src/favicon.ico --out=packages --platform=darwin --arch=all --overwrite
scripts.package:all: npm run electron-build && cross-var electron-packager dist $npm_package_name --icon=./src/favicon.ico --out=packages --all --arch=all --overwrite
